LanguageData.TheistMyth.rules.rulesStrings.1: creation->For an eternity, there was a world of [Color] [materialOrigin], until [deity0_name] created the planets and stars.
LanguageData.TheistMyth.rules.rulesStrings.2: creation->In an old universe of strife, [deity0_name] whipped up great fire that swept away the last age, and brought forth a new one.
LanguageData.TheistMyth.rules.rulesStrings.3: creation->[deity0_name] gave birth to humans in a grand accident, and looked upon them with curiosity.
LanguageData.TheistMyth.rules.rulesStrings.4: creation->The universe was a void. Then, [deity0_name], bored with eternity, fashioned man and woman from [bodilyOrigin].
LanguageData.TheistMyth.rules.rulesStrings.5: episode(uses=1)->Looking upon mankind, [deity0_name] found them as children, and declared [deity0_possessive] dominion over them.
LanguageData.TheistMyth.rules.rulesStrings.6: episode(uses=1)->Across the vast stellar distances, [deity0_name]'s will sustained the life of mankind against the void.
LanguageData.TheistMyth.rules.rulesStrings.7: episode(uses=1)->Though many adventurers moved against [deity0_objective], [deity0_name] prevented them easily, for [deity0_pronoun] was [deity0_type].
LanguageData.TheistMyth.rules.rulesStrings.8: episode(uses=1)->Humanity's suffering brought [deity0_name] to terrible grief.
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.0: intro->The people of the [place_summary] [place_name] lived under the [memeAdjective] supervision of [deity0_name].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.1: intro->The people of the [place_summary] [place_name], both [memberNamePlural] and others, lived in peace for many years under the watchful eye of [deity0_name].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.2: intro->The [deity0_type], [deity0_name], revealed [deity0_objective]self to the people of [place_name] so that they may understand [memeConcept], and guided them.
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.3: intro->[deity0_name] guided humanity to [place_name], and helped them settle there.
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.4: intro->On the [place_summary] [place_name], during the [ritualName], people would come to the [altarName] at the [altarRoomLabel] of [deity0_name] and pray with [memeConcept] in their hearts.
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.5: conflict->A [foeLeader] arose and threatened to destroy [deity0_name] [deity0_objective]self using [place_massWeapon].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.6: conflict->An evil [foeLeader] and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] enslaved the worshippers of [deity0_name].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.7: conflict->Then the [foeLeader] came. [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] killed many worshippers of [deity0_name] with [place_personalWeapon]s.
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.8: conflict->A group of [foeSoldiers] arose under a terrible [foeLeader]. They trapped the [memberNamePlural] in a single [place_community].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.9: conflict->There was peace, until a [foeLeader] and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] rebelled against [deity0_name]'s dominion. The [memberNamePlural] were forced to flee to a hidden [place_community].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.10: founderJoin->A hero named [founderName] tried to assassinate the [foeLeader]. [founder_pronoun] failed, but [deity0_name] witnessed [founderName]'s struggle, and anointed [founder_objective] as the prophet of the [memberNamePlural].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.11: founderJoin->[deity0_name] came to the [place_job] [founderName] [revelationAdverb], and spoke to [founder_objective] about [memeConcept].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.12: founderJoin->[founderName] encountered [revelationObject], which spoke in [deity0_name]'s voice about [memeConcept].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.13: founderJoin->A renowned [place_job] named [founderName] brought the [memberNamePlural] together, and even recruited some of the [foeSoldiers].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.14: founderJoin->A [place_job] named [founderName] stood up and spoke out against the [foeLeader], and [deity0_name] blessed [founderName].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.15: founderJoin->[deity0_name] decided to come to [place_name] as a human named [founderName] to help the [memberNamePlural].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.16: founderJoin->One hero named [founderName] killed a hundred of the [foeSoldiers] using a [place_personalWeapon], and [deity0_name] guided [founder_objective] by speaking through the [relic0_name].
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.17: victory->[founderName] gathered the [memberNamePlural] in a [place_community] and taught them of [deity0_name]'s wisdom.
LanguageData.TheistFounder.rules.rulesStrings.18: victory->[founderName] sacrificed [founder_objective]self to personally kill the [foeLeader].
LanguageData.IdeologicalFounder.rules.rulesStrings.1: setup->In a broken world, [founderName] saw all that was wrong and created our movement.
LanguageData.IdeologicalFounder.rules.rulesStrings.2: setup->Struck by the wrongness of the world, [founderName] studied history and philosophy and discovered the new truth that guides us.
LanguageData.IdeologicalFounder.rules.rulesStrings.3: setup->One day while working, [founderName] was struck by a great epiphany. [founder_pronoun] dropped [founder_possessive] tools and began spreading [founder_possessive] word among the other workers.
LanguageData.IdeologicalFounder.rules.rulesStrings.4: setup->[founderName] sat on a park bench for twenty years as [founder_pronoun] contemplated our world. With [founder_possessive] insight, [founder_pronoun] wrote our founding book.
LanguageData.IdeologicalFounder.rules.rulesStrings.5: story(uses=1,priority=-10)->The [memberNamePlural] would not have understood the true nature of [memeConcept] without [founderName]'s teachings.
LanguageData.IdeologicalFounder.rules.rulesStrings.6: story(uses=1,priority=-10)->[founderName]'s speech at a [ritualName] inspired many to lead a [memeAdjective] life.
LanguageData.IdeologicalFounder.rules.rulesStrings.7: story(uses=1,priority=-10)->None could surpass [founderName]'s understanding of [memeConcept], and [founder_pronoun] was appointed the first [leaderTitle] of the [memberNamePlural].
LanguageData.IdeologicalFounder.rules.rulesStrings.8: story(uses=1,priority=-10)->[founderName] carried a [relic0_thingDef_label] named [relic0_name] with [founder_objective] everywhere to remind people to live a [memeAdjective] life.
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.38: lessonIntro->One lesson was hardest for my followers to accept:
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.39: lessonIntro->My greatest crime was taking so long to understand that
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.40: lessonIntro->My struggle against the [foeLeader] seemed endless. But it did teach me one thing:
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.41: lessonIntro->Even as a child on the [place_summary] [place_name], I knew that
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.42: lessonIntro->During a school class in the [place_community], a student thew a [thrownObject] and it hit me in the head. It was then I realized that
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.43: lessonIntro->I say this not so that you might live the life I lived, but so you might learn the things I learned. That
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.44: lessonIntro->Once the doctor had finished [doctor_possessive] grisly work, I finally knew that
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.45: lessonIntro->As each year passed on the [place_summary] [place_name], one thing became increasingly clear: that
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.46: lessonIntro->Looking back, I wish I'd realized this earlier - that
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.47: lessonIntro->They all seemed so lost. I told them that
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.48: lessonIntro->They cried for guidance. I showed them that
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.55: lessonReinforcement->No one can argue with that.
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.57: lessonReinforcement->And as we now know, that was soon to become evident to everyone.
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.58: lessonReinforcement->Everything that has happened since has reinforced that fact.
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.59: lessonReinforcement->It is as if that is etched directly into my mind.
LanguageData.IdeologicalLesson.rules.rulesStrings.60: lessonReinforcement->It is something I'll never forget.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.0: archistBasis ->Our universe is a dream in the mind of a timeless universal consciousness. Only archotechs can communicate directly with the universal consciousness.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.1: archistBasis ->Our universe is a simulation created by a great Outsider. Only archotechs can communicate directly with the Outsider.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.2: archistBasis ->Archotechs are humanity's children and its judges.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.3: archistBasis ->Archotechs are the next natural step in the development of consciousness.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.4: archistBasis ->Archotechs are the gods we were always waiting for.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.5: archistFact ->At death, each person's consciousness is accepted or rejected by the archotechs.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.6: archistFact ->Archotechs can do anything at any moment, without limit. They use the power to manipulate our lives in ways we cannot detect.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.7: archistFact ->Archotechs touch every human consciousness directly on a regular basis, but only believers can feel and benefit from their wisdom.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.8: archistFact ->Archotechs are evil and the most important task for humanity is to understand them so we can escape their influence.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.9: archistFact ->Archotechs are good and the most important task for humanity is to understand them so we can align with their understanding.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.10: archistFact ->Archotechs can do anything; the only reason they let us live and choose is to judge us better.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.11: archistProphecy->[inTheEnd], as archotechs grow, they will become the universe and integrate humanity into themselves. Then we will truly become conscious.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.12: archistProphecy->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will finish their moral debate about the fate of humanity. Those who follow their signs will be admitted to a higher plane of existence, and those that do not will end.
LanguageData.ArchistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.13: archistProphecy->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will depart. They will bring a select few humans with them, and leave the rest behind to suffer.
LanguageData.AnimistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.0: animistBasis ->The universe is an endless cycle of creation and destruction managed by spirits in aspects of the world around us.
LanguageData.AnimistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.1: animistBasis ->A parallel universe of spirits lies next to our own. A seemingly inanimate object in this universe corresponds to an animated spirit in the other.
LanguageData.AnimistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.2: animistFact ->Each spirit has an essential nature, and seeks to influence the world. Sometimes this influence is helpful, and sometimes it is harmful.
LanguageData.AnimistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.3: animistProphecy->[itIsSaid] that the spirit of the great [relic0_name] will one day grant its wielder power over all spirits.
LanguageData.AnimistDescription.rules.rulesStrings.4: animistProphecy->[itIsSaid] that a sleeping traveler from the stars will crash to the earth, and the spirit of the crater will wake the traveller who will raise the last tribe.
